====== DESCRIPTION ======

As a part of our annual emerging artist promotion project, MAGA NY is seeking submission for its open call program ‚Äúwhen black swallows red‚Äù co-hosted with La Mama La Galleria, in East Village, NYC. Artists working in all media are welcomed to submit.

The theme comes from one of Mark Rothko‚Äôs remarks about his artistic concerns: ‚Äú‚Ä¶(if) there is only one thing I fear in life, my friend: one day, the black will swallow the red.‚Äù

While people often believe there are metaphorical meanings behind it, the arcane statement is open for interpretation, as we welcome artists to explore the concepts of processing, oxidizing, coloring, decaying, migration, and transformation to decode, respond, reflect or re-contextualize this statement.

On view: July 5th - July 10th (open reception: July 5th, 5:30 PM)
Submission Deadline: June 25th
Venue: La Mama La Galleria, 47 Great Jones St, New York, NY 10003
please visit http://www.whenblackswallowsred.com for the details

The selection will be made on a rolling-base so we encourage you to submit early!

MAGA (Metropolitan Art Gallery Association) is a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit organization. We aim to facilitate the cultural and intellectual exchanges in contemporary art in the NYC metropolitan area through curatorial events, publications, and public exposure.

====== DESCRIPTION ======

It‚Äôs that time of the year again- Denise Bibro Fine Art announces "Art From The Boros VII"

From numerous submissions and studio visits, diverse artists were selected to participate in this annual group show highlighting talent found within New York City‚Äôs five boroughs for the past 6 years.

Art From the Boros VII exemplifies the eclectic artistic community of New York City, showing a varied range of genres of art and mediums. The mission of the exhibition is to seek and find the pulse of talent in the city that is often overlooked and underexposed. The primary purpose of the exhibition is to bring untapped and underexposed talent in all of the 5 boroughs of New York to the public‚Äôs attention.

After visiting all the finalists‚Äô studios, a selection of the most talented of the group will be featured in a group exhibition at Denise Bibro Fine Art. Two artists will be chosen to have a special exhibition of their work.
